sourcing.instructions: - Silver: Purchase from a local metal supplier or online precious metal dealer.
steps: - Silver: Purchase from a local metal supplier or online precious metal dealer.
1. Weigh out each material using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out each material using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 800 °C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 800 °C.

steps: 1. After melting, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After melting, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 2 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solidified material from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solidified material from the crucible.
